analysis.key_quote: I am fully against the changes which will further politicize the civil service whose job it is to serve the American people in a non-partisan and effective manner.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about politicization of the civil service and the detrimental effects on expertise and continuity. It emphasizes the need for a non-partisan civil service, which aligns with the themes of merit-based systems and due process.
